attributes.action: Abolish plans to introduce congestion charges in Greater Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For those who have to travel in and out of the city centre on a daily basis, congestion charges will impose a significant increase in the cost of living for many people, if the government wish to reduce congestion on such a large scale perhaps they should review the standards of public transport.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with one in existence already - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/manchestercharge/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
